CustomField.description: Link to the User Story promotion branch in Git. The link is generated based on the Base Branch URL of the Git Repository record.
CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK( IF( AND( NOT(ISNULL(copado__Project__r.copado__Deployment_Flow__r.copado__Git_Repository__r.copado__Branch_Base_URL__c )), copado__Project__r.copado__Deployment_Flow__r.copado__Git_Repository__r.copado__Branch_Base_URL__c != '' ), IF( AND(NOT(ISPICKVAL(copado__Project__r.copado__Deployment_Flow__r.copado__Git_Repository__r.copado__Git_Provider__c,'')),NOT(ISPICKVAL(copado__Project__r.copado__Deployment_Flow__r.copado__Git_Repository__r.copado__Git_Provider__c, 'Others'))), copado__Project__r.copado__Deployment_Flow__r.copado__Git_Repository__r.copado__Branch_Base_URL__c + 'promotion/' + Name , IF( CONTAINS(copado__Project__r.copado__Deployment_Flow__r.copado__Git_Repository__r.copado__Branch_Base_URL__c,'[BRANCH_NAME]'), SUBSTITUTE(copado__Project__r.copado__Deployment_Flow__r.copado__Git_Repository__r.copado__Branch_Base_URL__c,'[BRANCH_NAME]','promotion/' + Name), copado__Project__r.copado__Deployment_Flow__r.copado__Git_Repository__r.copado__Branch_Base_URL__c + 'promotion/' + Name ) ), IF( AND( NOT(ISNULL(copado__Release__r.copado__Project__r.copado__Deployment_Flow__r.copado__Git_Repository__r.copado__Branch_Base_URL__c )), copado__Release__r.copado__Project__r.copado__Deployment_Flow__r.copado__Git_Repository__r.copado__Branch_Base_URL__c != '' ), IF( AND(NOT(ISPICKVAL(copado__Release__r.copado__Project__r.copado__Deployment_Flow__r.copado__Git_Repository__r.copado__Git_Provider__c,'')),NOT(ISPICKVAL(copado__Release__r.copado__Project__r.copado__Deployment_Flow__r.copado__Git_Repository__r.copado__Git_Provider__c, 'Others'))), copado__Release__r.copado__Project__r.copado__Deployment_Flow__r.copado__Git_Repository__r.copado__Branch_Base_URL__c + 'promotion/' + Name , IF( CONTAINS(copado__Release__r.copado__Project__r.copado__Deployment_Flow__r.copado__Git_Repository__r.copado__Branch_Base_URL__c,'[BRANCH_NAME]'), SUBSTITUTE(copado__Release__r.copado__Project__r.copado__Deployment_Flow__r.copado__Git_Repository__r.copado__Branch_Base_URL__c,'[BRANCH_NAME]','promotion/' + Name), copado__Release__r.copado__Project__r.copado__Deployment_Flow__r.copado__Git_Repository__r.copado__Branch_Base_URL__c + 'promotion/' + Name ) ), '' ) ), 'promotion/' + Name )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Link to the User Story promotion branch in Git. The link is generated based on the Base Branch URL of the Git Repository record.
CustomField.label: View in Git
